title: China vows to protect iself from U.S. trade threats
text:
China vows to protect iself from U.S. trade threats 2:13pm BST - 01:34
China says it will impose its own tariffs on the U.S. if Washington's renewed threat of slapping tariffs on $50 billion of goods from Beijing is followed through. Laura Frykberg reports.
China says it will impose its own tariffs on the U.S. if Washington's renewed threat of slapping tariffs on $50 billion of goods from Beijing is followed through. Laura Frykberg reports. //reut.rs/2L8TOS7
